translations: n.艾尔谷犬（有黑斑的大型狗）；航空母舰上的管理人员

phrs.translation: 万能梗, 爱登, 雅列顿, 大狗
万能梗, 万能挭, 万能更, 艾尔谷犬

sentences.sentence: When he was in junior high , local firemen dubbed him " Duke " after a tagalong Airedale .
sentences.translation: 在他上初中时，当地的消防员用他宠物——一条硬毛猎犬的名字“公爵”，给他起了个绰号。

sentences.sentence: These are feisty energetic dogs whose sizes range from fairly small as in the Norfolk cairn or west highland white terrier to the grand airedale terrier.
sentences.translation: 这些活泼、精力旺盛的梗类犬，体形从小到大都有，体形较小的有罗福梗、凯安梗及西部高地白梗，体形高大的有万能梗等。

sentences.sentence: These are feisty, energetic dogs whose sizes range from fairly small, as in the Norfolk, cairn or west highland white terrier, to the grand airedale terrier.
sentences.translation: 这些活泼、精力旺盛的梗类犬，体形从小到大都有，体形较小的有罗福梗、凯安梗及西部高地白梗，体形高大的有万能梗等。
